attributes.action: Sanitary & Menopausal products to become free of charge in England.
attributes.additional_details: Women do not choose to have these medical conditions, but over the years of their lives, have to pay many £'s. Making those products free of charge cannot be achieved unless Gov't make this a mandatory piece of legislation.
attributes.background: Debate this proposal in the HOC, discuss the rights of women, the cost of such a proposal, consider significant reduced prescription charges, Issuing tampon vouchers to school aged girls, but ultimately pass legislation making the costs of those products free of charge.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597571
